Happy Fourth of July. -AK https://www.klobuchar.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/news-releases?ID=1EBDD4B4-E010-4270-B127-5B9BAD7F4924 …

July 4th is a day that brings us together in celebration of America. It is a time to remember that American’s diversity of ppl & beliefs, our principles of life, liberty & the pursuit of happiness & our ongoing desire to create a more perfect union have always made us stronger.

One example of those democratic improvements was celebrated just this year, 100yrs since Congress passed the 19th Amendment & women secured the right to vote. Today, we finally have more women serving in Congress than ever before. That’s progress. And that’s the story of America.

America’s founding principle is that we can always do better, an idea enshrined in the first lines of our Constitution which says: ‘We the People of the United States, in Order to form a more perfect Union…’
#IndependenceDayUSA
#happyfourthofjuly

As you prepare to celebrate the 4th of July remember to always have an adult supervise fireworks activities. Parents don't realize that children suffer injuries from sparklers. Sparklers burn at temperatures of about 2,000 degrees -hot enough to melt some metals. #CelebrateSafely pic.twitter.com/iT3zh8LCJD

Did you know that government impostor scams top the list of reported frauds? Be suspicious of any call from a govt. agency asking for money or info. Govt. agencies don’t call you with threats, or promises of –or demands for– money. Scammers do. #ScamAlert https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/blogs/data-spotlight/2019/07/government-imposter-scams-top-list-reported-frauds …
